heading: Connect your Wallet
content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Laborum obcaecati dignissimos quae quo ad iste ipsum officiis deleniti asperiores sit.

walletData.title: MetaMask
walletData.content: A browser extension with great flexibility. The web's most popular wallet

walletData.title: Authereum
walletData.content: A user-friendly wallet that allows you to sign up with your phone number on any device

walletData.title: WalletConnect
walletData.content: Pair with Trust, Argent, MetaMask & more. Works from any browser, without an extension

walletData.title: Dapper
walletData.content: A security-focused cloud wallet with pin codes and multi-factor authentication

walletData.title: Kaikas
walletData.content: A simple-to-use wallet that works on both mobile and through a browser extension
